parameters.name: CommandID
parameters.description: Command ID of the command to remove as defined by swCommands_e

parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Document types in which to remove the command as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

parameters.name: SelectionType
parameters.description: Context-sensitive menu from which to remove the command as defined by swSelectType_e NOTE: Specifying swSelEVERYTHING will remove the command from all context-sensitive menus

parameters.name: RemoveParentMenu
parameters.description: True to remove the specified command's any parent menus, false to not

title: ISldWorks.RemoveFromPopupMenu
description: Removes the specified menu item from one or all specified context-sensitive menus (also called shortcut menus and pop-up menus) for the specified document types.
signature:
System.Boolean RemoveFromPopupMenu( 
   System.Int32
CommandID
,
   System.Int32
DocumentType
,
   System.Int32
SelectionType
,
   System.Boolean
RemoveParentMenu
)

parameters.name: CommandID
parameters.description: Command ID of the command to remove as defined by swCommands_e

parameters.name: DocumentType
parameters.description: Document types in which to remove the command as defined in swDocumentTypes_e

parameters.name: SelectionType
parameters.description: Context-sensitive menu from which to remove the command as defined by swSelectType_e NOTE: Specifying swSelEVERYTHING will remove the command from all context-sensitive menus

parameters.name: RemoveParentMenu
parameters.description: True to remove the specified command's any parent menus, false to not

remarks:
The removal of the specified menu item takes affect the next time the context-sensitive menu is displayed.
To remove main frame menu commands and menus, use
ISldWorks::RemoveFromMenu
.
This method is not persistent across SOLIDWORKS Design sessions.

examples.title: Remove Menu commands, Menus, and Toolbar Buttons (VBA)
